entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the one who did not visit his family at the Burrow.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the one who is surprised by Ron's absence from the Burrow.

entities.name: burrow
entities.description: The Burrow is mentioned as Ron's family home where he did not visit.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is mentioned as a person who has always been decent to Ron and provided him with shelter at Shell Cottage.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is mentioned as Bill's partner and the owner of Shell Cottage.

entities.name: shell cottage
entities.description: Shell Cottage is mentioned as a place where Ron has been staying with Bill and Fleur.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as one of Ron's brothers who would not have been understanding if Ron had gone back to the Burrow.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as another brother of Ron who would not have been understanding if Ron had gone back to the Burrow.

relationships.description: Ron did not visit his family at the Burrow.
Hermione was surprised by Ron's absence from the Burrow.
Bill provided Ron with shelter at Shell Cottage.
Fleur is the owner of Shell Cottage.
